backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder with no content.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point defining metadata, favicon, and root app mount point.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all crawling and pointing to sitemap.xml.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap listing all public routes with change frequency and priority metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Primary React app with router setup, navigation, layout, SEO handling, and page registrations.
frontend/src/components/AdPlaceholder.ts: Stub component that intentionally renders nothing to avoid ad injection.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and shows a fallback message with a refresh option.
frontend/src/components/tools/ExploreMor: Component that displays contextual links to related tools if available.
frontend/src/components/tools/LoadingInd: Small loading spinner component with optional text.
frontend/src/components/tools/RelatedToo: Displays a grid of related tools by filtering out the current tool and linking to other tool routes.
Provides a layout wrapper for tools with title, description, input area, action button, loading state, result output, and optional download button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base setup and CSS variables for light/dark themes along with global styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Shows an about page describing the platformâ€™s mission and listing its main offerings.
frontend/src/pages/AllToolsPage.tsx: Renders a grid of all available tools with icons, descriptions, and links to their respective routes.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatorsPage.tsx: Lists all calculator tools in a grid with icons and routes for navigation.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact page with email details, business inquiries, and support information using Card components.
frontend/src/pages/FinanceGuidesPage.tsx: Displays multiple finance-related guides with explanations on EMI, SIP, loans, GST, and planning tips.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides a homepage with hero section, tool category links, and a features section promoting the platform.
frontend/src/pages/ImageToolsPage.tsx: Lists image processing tools with icons and links, including compression, resizing, and format conversions.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Shows a 404 page with a message and buttons linking back to the homepage or all tools.
frontend/src/pages/PdfToolsPage.tsx: Displays PDF-related tools such as merge, split, compress, and conversions with icons and links.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Outlines privacy practices including data handling, file security, cookies, and policy updates.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Presents terms of service covering user agreement, service use, warranties, liability, and changes.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Age: Provides an age calculator that takes a birth date, validates it, and displays age in years, months, and days using ToolShell.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Bmi: Implements a BMI calculator that computes BMI from height and weight, shows category details, and displays errors or results.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Emi: Builds an EMI calculator that processes principal, interest rate, and tenure to output EMI, total payment, and interest.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Gst: Offers a GST add/remove calculator that computes GST amount and total/base values based on selected rate and mode.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Loa: Creates a loan calculator that computes monthly payment, total payment, and interest from loan amount, rate, and tenure.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Per: Includes tools for percentage-of and percentage-change calculations with tabbed UI and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Sip: SIP calculator page that collects investment inputs, runs calculateSip, and displays maturity, invested amount, and gains.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/ImageComp: Image compressor tool that accepts an image, applies adjustable compression, shows size reduction, and enables downloading the compressed result.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/ImageConv: Image converter UI allowing users to upload an image, select JPEG/PNG/WebP output, convert it, and download the new format.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/ImageResi: Image resizer interface for uploading an image, specifying width/height, optionally keeping aspect ratio, and downloading the resized file.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/JpgToPngP: Dedicated JPG-to-PNG converter that validates JPEG input, processes conversion, and provides the PNG output for download.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/PngToJpgP: PNG-to-JPG converter page that handles PNG upload, converts to JPG, and offers the converted file for download.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/CompressPdf: UI page allowing users to upload a PDF, run compressPdf, and download the compressed file.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/ImageToPdfP: Provides an interface to upload images, convert them to a PDF using createPdfFromImages, and download the result.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/JpgToPdfPag: Uses ToolShell to convert JPG/JPEG images to a PDF via createPdfFromImages with error handling and download support.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/PdfMergePag: UI for merging multiple PDFs via mergePdfs with validation, status handling, and file download.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/PdfSplitPag: Interface for splitting a PDF by page range using splitPdf, including input validation and download of the split file.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/PdfToImageP: Page that converts an uploaded PDF to images using pdfToImage and lets users download the resulting archive.
frontend/src/routes.ts: Defines all application routes for tools and pages and exports a Route type.
frontend/src/utils/calculators.ts: Implements age, GST, EMI, loan, and BMI calculation helpers with validation.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Provides utilities for triggering Blob downloads and generating timestamped filenames.
frontend/src/utils/exploreMoreTools.ts: Lists all tools, determines when to show suggestions, and returns related tool links.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formats bytes and numbers and computes percentage reduction values.
frontend/src/utils/image.ts: Handles image loading, compression, resizing, and format conversion using canvas.
frontend/src/utils/pdf.ts: Contains demo placeholder implementations for PDF creation, merging, splitting, compressing, and converting.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Defines SEO titles and descriptions for routes and manages page-specific SEO metadata.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/VERIFICATION_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist for verifying correct URL behavior, SEO metadata, and crawling for key tool pages.
project_state.json: Project state describing requirements to add a public Finance Guides page, include it in navigation, and update related routes and sitemap.
